about_the_game:
Wield the elements to compose the music in real time by battling your friends! Choose among the proposed maps, unite and combine the elements to create your unique mix, reflecting the process of fierce battle in abstract 2D space.

You can move up and down, and capture the nearby elements. Captured elements will deliver their sound, and by combining elements from both players (air, water, fire, earth) a unique musical blend is created. With capturing two elements, the spells become available depening on the elments pairing: air+water, air+fire, water+earth, fire+earth. Hitting enemy with the spells reduces their hit points, while captured elements increase hit points. When the music ends, the player with most hit points wins the match.

Play multiplayer against other people or locally vs AI: W,S - movement, E - capturing, Z,X,C,V - spells.

P.S.
The mobile version is planned soon.

name: Clash of the Elements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256Mb
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024Mb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
